level.heading: PRIVATE DRIVEWAYS ON P STREET S.W. (CG) (ยง 11-1609)

level.text: No private driveway may be constructed or used from P Street S.W. to any parking or loading berth areas in or adjacent to a building or structure subject to the provisions of this chapter that is constructed after February 16, 2007.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 1587-1592 (February 16, 2007); as corrected by Errata Notice published at 58 DCR 4314, 4315 (May 20, 2011).
